*.description: The component type the profile applies to

Modes.description: A nested object with the deployment mode name as the root and childs based on component types

*.description: The component type that the VMImage configuration belongs to.

Containers.description: Compute policy for container based resources

Weight.description: The ratio of containers allocated to the provider based on the configured providers

Additional.description: Providers who will meet the additional compute capacity outside of the default

Default.description: Sets the default computer provider which will meet base capacity

RequiredCount.description: The minimum count of containers to run on the default provider

Weight.description: The ratio of containers allocated to the provider based on the configured providers

ecs.description: The component type the profile applies to

ec2.description: The component type the profile applies to

computecluster.description: The component type the profile applies to

bastion.description: The component type the profile applies to

Description.description: A description to include as part of the Role

ServiceName.description: The Service domain name for the service you want to create the role for

Modes.description: A nested object with the deployment mode name as the root and childs based on component types

ecs.description: The component type the profile applies to

ec2.description: The component type the profile applies to

computecluster.description: The component type the profile applies to

bastion.description: The component type the profile applies to

ExecutionPolicy.description: Defines how groups can be used in this deployment mode

Order.description: How to evalute the priority ordering

GroupFilter.description: A regex filter to apply on group ids to include in the mode

Membership.description: How deployment groups are included in the mode and their ordering

Groups.description: A list of group ids in their deployment order

Operations.description: The deployment operations to complete for each deployment

Filter.description: The name of a Logfilter to apply to the forwarding rule

Links.description: The links of components which will accept fowarded logs

ForwardingRules.description: Controls the forwarding of logs after they have landed in their initial logging location

DeploymentFramework.description: The deployment framework to use to generate the outputs for deployment

Region.description: The id of the region to host the component

Provider.description: The provider to use to host the component

Links.description: Apply network security rules based on links

Tier.description: The storage tier to use for all volumes

Replication.description: The type of storage replication to use

data.description: A fixed volume to use for ES Data storage

Type.description: The type of volume to provision - see provider for available types

Size.description: The size in GB of the volume

Iops.description: For volume types which support provisioned IOPS, this sets the requested IOPS

Length.description: Length of an Array at a given JSON path

NotEmpty.description: Is the value of a JSON path not emtpy

Match.description: Does a JSON path match a value

Resource.description: Does a resource with the type exist

checkov.description: Run checkov on the file - https://github.com/bridgecrewio/checkov

SkipChecks.description: A list of checks to skip in checkov

Framework.description: The framework of the file to run testing against

IgnoreChecks.description: A list of checks to ignore in cfn-lint

Zone.description: The zone the endpoint belongs to

Parents.description: The parent of this domain segment

Bare.description: Use the name value of the domain as the full domain name value

Stem.description: The root stem domain name that children will be based on

Priority.description: The priority this group has in deployment mode processing

OutputPrefix.description: Overrides the prefix used when generating outputs - Defaults to the Id of the Group

Level.description: The deployment level to use for template generation

District.description: The id of the district for components included in the deployment group

ResourceLabels.description: The resource labels to include in the subset

GroupDeploymentUnit.description: Does the resource set span all units in the group

ResourceSets.description: Generate deployments based on resource labels across all units in the group

CompositeTemplate.description: A composite template file to include for this group

Domain.description: The Id of a domain reference to map to a product
